creator: Bineli
title: How to Write a Horror Story
description: This project provides instructions on how to write a horror story, from brainstorming ideas to the final revisions.
steps: Brainstorm scary ideas and things that scare you.
Plan the setting of your story. Consider using a single, mysterious location.
Develop the past of the protagonist or the setting and how it affects the story.
Add details about the characters, setting, and minor characters. Ask yourself: who does what?
Consider making the protagonist a loner to increase the horror.
Outline the plot of your story.
Decide on your exposition strategy: starting from the beginning or revealing the end first.
Write the story, incorporating details and descriptions, but avoid too much mystery.
Ensure all characters participate in the story.
Review and revise the finished story.
